publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1787 Mary Scanlon: New Highland Horticultural Industry - Bog Myrtle—That the Parliament congratulates Highland Natural Products Ltd on its work in developing extracts from the naturally occurring and sustainable crop of bog myrtle, or Myrica Gale, for a variety of health and pharmaceutical uses, for example anti-bacterial products and anti-oxidants; believes that this could produce a new horticultural industry and a welcome new potential source of income for landowners, crofters and small farmers in the Highlands, and further believes that the ongoing research represents a very exciting new venture for the Highlands.

*S2M-1787 Mary Scanlon: New Highland Horticultural Industry - Bog Myrtle—That the Parliament congratulates Highland Natural Products Ltd on its work in developing extracts from the naturally occurring and sustainable crop of bog myrtle, or Myrica Gale, for a variety of health and pharmaceutical uses; ** believes that this could produce a new horticultural industry and a welcome new potential source of income for landowners, crofters and small farmers in the Highlands, and further believes that the ongoing research represents a very exciting new venture for the Highlands. ** indicates words omitted

S2M-1787 Mary Scanlon: New Highland Horticultural Industry - Bog Myrtle—That the Parliament congratulates Highland Natural Products Ltd on its work in developing extracts from the naturally occurring and sustainable crop of bog myrtle, or Myrica Gale, for a variety of health and pharmaceutical uses; believes that this could produce a new horticultural industry and a welcome new potential source of income for landowners, crofters and small farmers in the Highlands, and further believes that the ongoing research represents a very exciting new venture for the Highlands. Supported by: Mr Ted Brocklebank*, Alex Johnstone*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*, David Mundell*, Mr Jamie McGrigor*, Shiona Baird*, Mark Ballard*
S2M-1787 New Highland Horticultural Industry - Bog Myrtle (lodged on 29 September 2004) Phil Gallie*, Robin Harper*, Murdo Fraser*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*
S2M-1787 New Highland Horticultural Industry - Bog Myrtle (lodged on 29 September 2004) Eleanor Scott*, Mr David Davidson*, Mr Brian Monteith*
S2M-1787 New Highland Horticultural Industry - Bog Myrtle (lodged on 29 September 2004) John Scott*, Nora Radcliffe*
S2M-1787 New Highland Horticultural Industry - Bog Myrtle (lodged on 29 September 2004) Mrs Nanette Milne*
S2M-1787 New Highland Horticultural Industry - Bog Myrtle (lodged on 29 September 2004) Rob Gibson*, Jim Mather*, Bruce Crawford*, Ms Sandra White*
S2M-1787 New Highland Horticultural Industry - Bog Myrtle (lodged on 29 September 2004) Bill Aitken*, Mr Mark Ruskell*
S2M-1787 New Highland Horticultural Industry - Bog Myrtle (lodged on 29 September 2004) Chris Ballance*
S2M-1787 New Highland Horticultural Industry - Bog Myrtle (lodged on 29 September 2004) Dr Jean Turner*
